message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can adjust if you'd like, but I think this is a good starting point.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I propose a 60/40 split in mine.  Given the inflation, accepting now is in both our best interests.

Okay, Bob, I see your point about the inflation. Let's compromise. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value of money is decreasing with each round. Let's wrap this up!
